prepared_for: Hon. Linda, Member, Rivers State House of Assembly
overview: The Linda Portfolio Website is a personal and constituency-focused digital platform highlighting Hon. Linda’s programs, values, and engagements with her constituency. It provides transparency and information about her Tech Empowerment Program, Social Intervention Fund, and other community efforts.
objectives: Present a professional, transparent, and accessible digital profile.
Promote awareness of Linda’s programs and initiatives.
Provide online access to empowerment applications.
Publish reports and testimonials for transparency.

programs.name: Tech Empowerment Program
programs.description: Free tech training, internships, and startup micro-grants for Okrika residents.

programs.name: Social Intervention Fund
programs.description: Community-based support for women and children, including micro-grants and education aid.

features.blog: Posts about programs, impact stories, and community activities.
features.gallery: Photos of events, training, and community engagement.
features.reports: Public reports and PDFs showing quarterly disbursements.
features.testimonials: Quotes from beneficiaries and community leaders.
features.contact: Office address, phone, email, and contact form (phase 2).

content_management.update_method: Manual updates or AI-generated content injection.

performance_seo.strategy: Static site generation, SEO meta tags, sitemap, lazy-loaded images

timeline.phase_1: UI design and structure setup (1 week)
timeline.phase_2: MD parsing and JSON integration (1 week)

final_deliverable: A fully functional, mobile-friendly website showcasing Hon. Linda’s programs and achievements.
